Name: TBI Infotech
AboutMe:
As trusted working partners we facilitate top enterprises, growing companies, and tech giants with innovative technology to outperform the competitive environment. With our unparallel experience and diverse capabilities we have built a reputation of reliable service providers by creating a distinctive competitive advantage for our global clients. TBI brings years of cross-industry expertise to customized web & mobile technologies, software development and consulting services. We implement agile best practices to offer offshore and onshore solutions like web & mobile development and designing, server hosting, mobile applications and other IT services. We have been working with global clients to turn them into high-performance corporations.

We deploy high-performance business strategy to create, collaborate, deploy and deliver quality solutions to our global business communities.

With information and entertainment going hand in hand, mobile phones have turned into an infotainment gadget. Android supporting system with various functionalities is used by global business fraternity to stand the test of time. Our Android professionals with expertise in deploying android to different platforms provide quality services from developing a consistent and user-friendly User Interface (UI) to integration of feature-rich app to embedded platforms. We use location based service APIs, 3D graphics, Android app development software, android SDK and open graphics library.

Services we provide in android application development:

• Android consulting services: To get an understanding of your business and leveraging solutions to build the right kind of business app

• Integration services: Integrating apps with GPS, maps, social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, media integration for music, pictures and videos

• Android application development: Provide end-to-end android application development from development, quality testing, to marketing of your android app

• Testing of apps against every security threat and bugs.

• Marketing and promotional strategies to build your brand name online.
